title: HSE Researcher Unveils Boris Pasternak's Never-before-seen Signature (Higher School of Economics)
text: ( Source : Higher School of Economics ) During a recent conference at Stanford University , Leonid Bolshukhin, lecturer in HSE Nizhny Novgorod 's Faculty of Humanities , presented a discovery dating back to Boris Pasternak 's school years. This
